product_name: Horny Toad Oolong Sleeveless Dress - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Fabric, shape and fit are perfected with the Horny Toad Oolong Sleeveless Dress. It looks just as nice with boots as it does with sandals. Made from a luscious blend of organic cotton slub, Tencel(R) lyocell and spandex, the Horny Toad Oolong dress stays breathable and has a nice drape. Asymmetric crossover neckline and darts at the bust and back give your curves a hug. Wide straps are bra-friendly and the triple banded, raw-edged bottom hem adds style. Closeout.
short_description: Fabric, shape and fit are perfected with the Horny Toad Oolong Sleeveless Dress. It looks just as nice with boots as it does with sandals.
